mapper.update: update qa_board set readcount = readcount+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select category from qa_board group by category
mapper.update: update qa_board set re_step=re_step+1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step>#{re_step}
mapper.insert: insert into qa_board(no, category, title, writer, password, company, content, image, reg_date, ref, re_step, re_level, ip) values(qa_seq.nextval,#{category},#{title},#{writer},#{password},#{company},#{content},#{image}, #{reg_date},#{ref},#{re_step}+1,#{re_level}+1,#{ip})
